s.text: That aside, the rapier is better than the bludgeon--unless, of course, you are a Los Angeles policeman hamstrung by goody-goody regulations made by a bunch of stupid, corrupt, persistently naive politicians who won't let a guy serve and protect.
Not for us the easy recourse to the our-leaders-are-all-corrupt-and-stupid gag--and let's assume they're not.
Astronomer John Kormendy explains new research showing that some small galaxies have dark matter densities about 100 times greater than that of large galaxies.
Dark matter constitutes most of the universe.
